items.title: Notice of Price Changes
items.author: HoloearthWebsiteAdmin
items.content:
Thank you for using the Holoearth service.

In a commitment to a more accessible platform for users, we are sold in Holoearth.

The revised prices can be confirmed in the in-app purchase screen from the effective date.

Note: There will be no change to the purchase price of HoloCoin (Premium).

There will be no changes to content that has already been purchased.

This revision applies only to ; user-made items will not be affected. Maintenance will be performed on February 2, 2025 (Fri). The specific time will be shared at a later date.

Thank you for your continued support.

items.title: NePoLaBo 10-Second Video Contest Results
items.author: HoloearthWebsiteAdmin
items.content:
Greetings from the Holoearth Management Team!

We are pleased to announce the results of the 10-second video contest for the virtual concert “NePoLaBo Live re:VISION Holoearth Live.” Thank you for the many great submissions! All of the entries that conveyed the love for NePoLaBo and the passion of the performance moved the entire staff.

After a careful review, the winning entries that shone especially brightly have been selected and are presented here. Winners will receive a commemorative in-app gift: “NePoLaBo Live Celebration T All Members Ver. (Signed).”

We will contact the winners via X direct message.

Momosuzu Nene Winning Clip

Omaru Polka Winning Clips

レギルスちゅーる(中尉)【雪民】さん An overwhelming display of star power—you can feel the aura from any angle!

The idea to film it behind was brilliant!

See the post here.

Yukihana Lamy Winning Clips

Shishiro Botan Winning Clips

レギルスちゅーる(中尉)【雪民】さん

Holoearth Tourism Agency Special Mentions

らぴす〖雪民〗さん X ID: @lapis5303

The very “Urya-oi!” that became an in-app gesture!

The fact that it captures not just Nene but also Lamy’s dancing really scores points!See the post here.

X ID: This adorable moment between Nene and Botan is captured perfectly!

It is an emotional scene that makes you want to see even more of their close moments.

See the post here.

items.title: Ver. 1.2.1.1 Release Notes
items.author: HoloearthWebsiteAdmin
items.content:
This is the Holoearth Management Team.

Holoearth was updated on January 19, 2026.

■

items.title: Tokino Sora New Year’s Party 2026 “Dreams in Motion” Support Campaign in Holoearth Announcement
items.author: HoloearthWebsiteAdmin
items.content:
Greetings from the Holoearth Management Team!

Starting Thursday, January 8, 2026, we are holding a support campaign for Tokino Sora New Year’s Party 2026 “Dreams in Motion” in Holoearth! During the campaign period, a street takeover featuring the concert’s key visual will be held, and items such as a new T-shirt will also be available for purchase in Holoearth.

Be sure to come by and show your support!

(Schedule is subject to change.)

Anyone can join in the festivities for free by downloading and installing Holoearth.

(Note: Holoearth is available only for Windows.)

The support campaign includes a street takeover featuring the concert’s key visual & the illustration for “Pulse” in Alternative City.

“Dreams in Motion” Commemorative Items

New items were added to the “hololive production official shop in HOLOEARTH”. A T-shirt featuring the concert key visual will be included, as well as the return of the popular Tokino Sora “Sync Hoodie” and “Sync Cap”!

(Schedule is subject to change.)

・Tokino Sora “Dreams in Motion” T

・Tokino Sora Sync Hoodie (Blk / Pk)

・Tokino Sora Sync Cap (Blk / Pk)

In addition, pathfinder items inspired by Tokino Sora are also for sale!

January 8, 2026 (Thu) after maintenance.

・Pathfinder Jacket Tokino Sora

・Pathfinder Sneakers Tokino Sora

items.title: “NePoLaBo Live Preview Area” Special Opening & 10-Second Video Contest Announcement
items.author: HoloearthWebsiteAdmin
items.content:
Greetings from the Holoearth Management Team!

In addition, we are accepting entries for the “NePoLaBo Live re:VISION Holoearth Live 10-Second Video Contest”! We look forward to seeing short videos of your favorite NePoLaBo Live scenes from the full performance!

“NePoLaBo Live Preview Area” Free Entry Area Now Open!

This area is a free-to-enter experience area. Even those experiencing Holoearth for the first time can participate using a PC (Windows).

Come meet NePoLaBo in Holoearth!

Anyone can join in the festivities for free by downloading and installing Holoearth.

(Note: Holoearth is available only for Windows.)

10-Second Video Contest Start!

hololive 5th Generation “NePoLaBo” (Momosuzu Nene / Omaru Polka / Yukihana Lamy / Shishiro Botan)

Selected outstanding entries will be specially featured on the official website, and winners will also receive a commemorative digital in-app prize: The “NePoLaBo Live Celebration T All Members Ver. (Signed)”

(Schedule is subject to change.)

From the Options menu, please toggle OFF “NaviRobo” and “User names”. Record the video at a resolution of 1920×1080 pixels (Full HD) or higher. The submission must be a video 10 seconds or less, with in-concert audio, clipped from the full performance of “NePoLaBo Live re:VISION Holoearth Live.” Post the video on X with the following hashtag (submit as many times as you like): #NePoLaBoHoloearthLive

Edits and combining multiple scenes together will not be accepted.

Only a single scene may be used (no editing).

Using videos or materials external to this performance will not be accepted.

Please use the original audio from the selected scene as-is.

Audio editing, processing, or adding other audio sources is prohibited.
